title: [Orzel's Armory]
[Orzel's Weaponry]
description: The broad sweep of the oak floor is interrupted by an open-mawed greater vruul statue.  Halfway to the vaulted ceiling, a snarling troll king mask hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A bamboo rack and a vine-carved mahogany table are pushed close together in the back of the shop.
